summary: This module defines comprehensive unit tests for the UniPC multistep scheduler used in diffusion pipelines. It exercises the scheduler with one‑dimensional dummy data and full‑generation loops under various configurations, including different noise predictions, schedule types (standard, Karras), precision settings, and solver options, to verify correct behavior and integration.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and correctness of the UniPC scheduler component in AI diffusion models, ensuring stable and accurate image generation across diverse deployment scenarios.
